rule.name: EAP_setInvokeDataParamForHistoricalData
rule.description: Hold rule to set invoke data
rule.definition: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!uploadHistoricDataTemp, expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson_v1"( 'type!{urn:com:appian:types}EAP_Temp_HistoricalDataCallParam'( processId: index( fv!item, "processId", null ), requestId: index( ri!requestDetails, "requestId", null ), appianDocumentId: index( fv!item, "appianDocumentId", null ), month: if( or(index( fv!item, "frequency", null ) = #"_a-0000e56b-0831-8000-5261-1bef901bef90_661220"[1], index( fv!item, "frequency", null ) = #"_a-0000e56b-0831-8000-5261-1bef901bef90_661220"[3] ), "N/A", index( fv!item, "month", null ) ), year: if( index( fv!item, "frequency", null ) = #"_a-0000e56b-0831-8000-5261-1bef901bef90_661220"[1], "N/A", index( fv!item, "year", null ) ), action: index( fv!item, "action", null ), entityMappingId: index( fv!item, "histEntityMappingId", null ), parsingHistTransId: index(ri!historicalTrans,"parsing_hist_trans_id",null), frequency: if( index( fv!item, "frequency", null ) = #"_a-0000e56b-0831-8000-5261-1bef901bef90_661220"[1], "daily", if( index( fv!item, "frequency", null ) = #"_a-0000e56b-0831-8000-5261-1bef901bef90_661220"[2], "monthly", "yearly" ) ), date: if( or( index( fv!item, "frequency", null ) = #"_a-0000e56b-0831-8000-5261-1bef901bef90_661220"[2], index( fv!item, "frequency", null ) = #"_a-0000e56b-0831-8000-5261-1bef901bef90_661220"[3] ), "N/A", datetext( gmt(index( fv!item, "daily", null )), "dd/MM/yyy" ) ) ) ) )
